author: newsr.in
title: Star Wars Battlefront Is Biggest Ever for EA, Prepare to Not Play It on Launch Day - newsR
text: Star Wars Battlefront from Electronic Art and DICE is undoubtedly already a winner, and we're only now seeing just how many fans the Star Wars universe really has. EA has reported that nine million players have logged on and played the Beta, which is a huge number by any calculations. It's difficult to understand just how many is nine million. Let's use Steam as a comparison: when the number of users is at its highest on Steam, it hits 10 million. Granted, this happens almo... Â»
